query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'employees'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2y6sS8DpnU5zjJD.root --database 9Rouc7DxCXtQDEEF5GnzG8 --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'employees'
